Question: Palmplug CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Palmplug CES 2024

- Palmplug unveiled its latest wearable technology, the Palmplug One, at CES 2024.
- The compact glove tracks hand movements with sensors on each finger and thumb, providing real-time feedback for people with reduced sensory movement.
- It features high-fidelity motion sensors, haptic feedback, and visual cues with multicolored LEDs.
- The device offers realistic tactile feedback for immersive experiences and can be used for virtual reality applications.
- The glove aims to assist stroke patients in rehabilitation and help students learn to play musical instruments.
